snippet: For some foreign-born comedians in New York, stand-up can be a milestone to assimilation, whether appealing to niche audiences or seeking to build a mainstream following.
abstract: Some foreign-born comedians find that success in a New York City venue can be something of a milestone of assimilation as they deliver humor that is not only in English, but with enough appeal in the material for a broad and diverse audience to digest.
lead_paragraph: For some foreign-born comedians in New York, stand-up can be a milestone to assimilation, whether appealing to niche audiences or seeking to build a mainstream following.

headline.seo: Melting Pot Offers Varied Buffet of Immigrant Comedians
headline.main: In Diverse City, Audiences Where Every Joke Translates
headline.print_headline: In Diverse City, Audiences Where Every Joke Translates
